attributes.action: That the next Honours List be restricted to key workers only.
attributes.additional_details: Too often we read and hear about Honours being handed out to celebrities, sports personalities and party political donors. By leaving such people off the Honours List, this would help restore some measure off trust in British politics.
attributes.background: I would just like a one-off Honours List that pays tribute to those who have continued to work during the pandemic, especially (but not limited to) public sector staff. I believe it would be a fitting recognition of their efforts to put country before self.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments. The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/

There is a separate form for nominating someone for an honour for coronavirus-related work: https://www.gov.uk/honours/nominate-someone-for-coronavirus-work
